name: MyLily
0:
”Alexa, launch my lily”
”Alexa, open my lily”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my lily
des: You can now place your restaurant take-out orders conveniently by talking to any of your Amazon Alexa devices or the Alexa app on your phone. No more being put on hold when you call in to place your take-out orders or errors in your orders due to miscommunication. Get your orders right every time, hassle-free. Our skill "My Lily" is free to use. When you enable "My Lily" skill on you Alexa devices, please grant permission to access your name, email and cell phone # so "My Lily" could send order confirmation and updates to your cell phone and email. We are working hard to include other restaurants in our service to make your life easier. Please note that at this time My Lily does not take payments for your order. You will have to pay for your orders directly at the restaurant.
